query.statement:
SELECT A.MANDT AS MANDT , '' AS FLAG , A.DOCNO AS DOCNO , A.DOCKIND AS DOCKIND , A.APPGUBN AS APPGUBN , A.SEQNO AS SEQNO , A.SEQSTAT AS SEQSTAT , A.APDPT1 AS APDPT1 , A.APDPT1_N AS APDPT1_N , A.APNUM AS APNUM , A.APRNK AS APRNK , A.APIRUM AS APIRUM , A.APDATE AS APDATE , A.APTIM AS APTIM , A.APDESC AS APDESC , VALUE(D.CS121_SPT,'') AS SPT , VALUE(D.CS121_UPN,'') AS PJT , (SELECT CASE MAX(GBU) WHEN '1' THEN 'Á÷¿µ' ELSE 'Çù·Â»ç' END FROM SAPHEE.ZCST111 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND PJT = SUBSTR(VALUE(B.PJT,''),1,6) AND HST <> 'D') GBU FROM SAPHEE.ZWBAP02 A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT REQNO, MAX(POSID) PJT FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT031 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND REQNO = #DOCNO# GROUP BY REQNO ) B ON B.REQNO = A.DOCNO INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST111 C INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST121 D ON D.MANDT = C.MANDT AND D.CS121_UPN = C.UPN AND D.CS121_CST = C.CST ON C.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND C.PJT = SUBSTR(B.PJT,1,6) AND C.HNO = SUBSTR(B.PJT,7,3) WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.DOCNO = #DOCNO# AND A.DOCKIND = #DOCKIND#
ORDER BY A.MANDT, A.DOCNO, A.DOCKIND, A.APPGUBN, A.SEQNO DESC FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
